name: WolfBit
description:
WE SHALL DESTROY THE DARKNESS.

WE SHALL DESTROY THE EVIL.

WE SHALL DESTROY THE BEAST.

Wolfbit is our entry for both Ludum Dare 35 AND LowRezJam 2016.

CONTROLS:

In the game, the current controls (yep, they change) are shown in the upper part of the screen.

From left to right:

Up, Down, Left, Right.

We are really proud of it as an exercise in atmosphere, experimental mechanics and, most importantly, good ol' awesome teamwork.

Our team:

Code: Mr. Strings (AKA Pedro Stringhini) (@PHString on twitter)

Graphics: Matheus Mortatti (@MatheusMortatti on Twitter)

Sound: Leonardo Villani (@LeoCVF on Twitter)

We will be glad to hear any comments, suggestions, bug reports and cool tips from you guys.
